headline: Did Targa’s 25% Dividend Hike and Permian Buildout Just Reframe TRGP’s Investment Narrative?
summary: Targa Resources has reported past 2025 results showing revenue of US$4,055.5 million for the fourth quarter and US$17.03 billion for the full year, with net income of US$545 million and US$1.92 billion respectively, alongside completing US$641.86 million of share repurchases under its August 2024 program. Alongside record earnings and ongoing Permian and Gulf Coast buildouts, Targa plans a 25% increase to its 2026 annual common dividend to US$5.00 per share, highlighting a stronger focus on...
